CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February, 28, 1953, pg. 17 reads: "Platform Guests...A section of the speakers platform is shown as the program got under way Monday night at the citizens birthday testimonial for Mrs. Robert L. Vann. Pictured, left to right, Judge Hobson R. Reynolds of Philadelphia; Mrs. Burrell K. Johnson, Johnstown, Pa.; Mayor and Mrs. David L. Lawrence, P.L. Prattis, executive editor of the Courier and general chairman of the party; Mrs. Toki Schalk Johnson, mistress of ceremonies; Mrs. Vann, William G. Nunn, managing editor of the Courier; Mrs. Alma Illery, national president of the Achievement Clubs, Inc.; Mrs. Alma A. Polk, Courier employee; Ethel Ramos Harris, pianist-composer, and Judge Lois McBride: Out of the picture were Dr. and Mrs. O. Walton of the Council of Churches, and the Rev. and Mrs. Samuel D. Rudder of Holy Cross."
TitMainTitle: Men and women, from left: unknown man, Judge Hobson R. Reynolds, Mrs. Burrell K. Johnson, Mayor and Mrs. David L. Lawrence, P. L. Prattis, Toki Schalk Johnson, speaking into microphone, Jessie Vann, William G. Nunn, Mrs. Alma Illery, Alma A. Polk, Ethel Ramos Harris, Judge Lois McBride, and unknown woman, gathered on stage with sunburst patterned curtain, possibly in Syria Mosque, for birthday testimony for Jessie Vann
